condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Government systems are strengthened to enable universal access to WASH services

description.narrative: Previously lagging, sector-wide monitoring, coordination and financing are now evolving with broad stakeholder support, including UNICEF's. The operationalization of the new WASH MIS signals the strong government ownership and will ensure better transparency and decision-making. A WASH sector Finance Technical Working Group was created, has begun WASH sector financial analysis and identified a pathway to develop a strategic financing plan. Five key ministries, more than in the past, attended and were engaged in the 2020 WatSan Joint Sector Review. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/08/2020
